casebody.data:
Theresa KOPFINGER, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. ATLANTIC TRANSPORT CO. OF WEST VIRGINIA, Defendant-Appellant. No. 71. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 21, 1930. Kirlin, Campbell, Hickox, Keating & Mc-Grann, of New York City (Vernon S. Jones and Raymond Parmer, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lucian V. Axtell, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on the authority of Miller v. Maryland Casualty Co. (C. C. A.) 40 F.(2d) 463.
